longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of normal passports issued to nationals of Korea (Rep.) who
have previously entered Mongolia at least 4 times within the
last 2 years, or at least 10 visits in total.
Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a confirmation of a pre-arranged visa can obtain
  a single entry visa on arrival, at Ulaanbaatar (ULN),
  provided:  
Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold proof of sufficient funds to cover their
  stay and documents required for their next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
